Texts.Chs: 把^orange;基因合成器^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Gene Design Lab^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 非常感谢你，你真是救了我一命！现在我可以继续我的实验了！
Texts.Eng: Thanks so much. You are a life saver! Now I can tinker with life as we know it!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;基因合成器^reset;真是造物主赐予的神迹。有了它，您将可以创造^green;新的植物^reset;。快去^orange;建造一个^reset;并带给我。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Gene Design Labs^reset; are all the rage these days. I want one, but my budget can't swing it. Do you have one lying around I might use?
